item.description:
Bring your friends and join in the fun as we celebrate the release of the Player’s Handbook 2, packed with new options for your Dungeons & Dragons 4th Edition game. Come try out the new races (such as the gnome) and the new classes (like the invoker and barbarian) while you battle wicked fiends and thwart dark plots. No matter if you’re new to the game or a 4th Edition veteran; we’ll have everything you need to embark on an all-new adventure!

To satisfy your curiosity, here’s a quick description of the adventure! One Dark Night in Weeping Briar – A stormy night, an empty town, and a small girl that holds the key to the strange disappearances. An adventure for 5 pregenerated 11th-level characters.

Event structure - Play a 2-3 hour adventure entitled “One Dark Night in Weeping Briar”, created especially for the event. The 11th-level adventure comes with pregenerated characters, drawing on options from Player’s Handbook 2 and other upcoming products. In addition to the adventure, a trivia activity is included.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Matthew Szewczyk or the D&D Event
item.name: Celebrating the release of PHB 2
